name: CLICK OF CTHULHU
description:
Click Of Cthulhu was born from the idea of creating a city building game on Gameboy. The game was created in one week with Unity. Not a single line of code has been written to make this game thanks to Playmaker!

Black Flag

Black Flag is cooperative of two friends based in Bordeaux, France. We brew independent games and develop hopped beers! Our next game is called Orphan Age, it's a dystopian simulation game where you look after orphans left behind in a cyberpunk war. You can play the demo here and here.

You can support us by adding orphan Age to your wishlist on Steam or by joining the private Alpha today at: orphan-age.com

Hop on on Discord to chat with us: http://discord.gg/oa

THANKS FOR PLAYING! FHTAGN!
